start_time <- Sys.time()
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",

  fig.width = 6,

  out.width = "100%",

Annex with the list of IGOs (@doi:10.1177/0022343319881175) and 
countries (@cow_2017) included on this package.


## List of IGOs

```{r igo, echo=FALSE}

library(igoR)
library(reactable)

igo <- igo_search()
reactable(igo[, 1:7],
  filterable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  paginationType = "jump",
  elementId = "igos"
)
```



## List of Countries 

```{r countries, echo=FALSE}

cc <- states2016
reactable(cc,
  filterable = TRUE,
  searchable = TRUE,
  showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  paginationType = "jump",
  elementId = "countries"
)
```
